title: Enabling SSH access to Git repositories in Bitbucket Server | Bitbucket Data Center and Server 7.5 | Atlassian Documentation

descrip: Using the SSH protocol, you can connect and authenticate to remote servers and services. With SSH keys, you can connect to GitHub without supplying your username and personal access token at each visit.
title: About SSH - GitHub Docs

descrip: We’re changing which keys are supported in SSH and removing unencrypted Git protocol. If you’re an SSH user, read on for the details and timeline.
title: Improving Git protocol security on GitHub | The GitHub Blog

descrip: If you’ve tried to use Git with multiple different providers, or with multiple different accounts, you may run into issues with authenticated them both at the same time. Here’s how to manage two accounts without running into conflicts.
title: How to Manage Multiple Git Accounts on One System
